'''''Minecraft: Dungeons & Dragons (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the first soundtrack released for ''[[Minecraft]]'' by Kyle Martin Cora, known professionally as "Kylydian", which consists of the songs that were released as part of the [[Dungeons & Dragons DLC|''Dungeons & Dragons'' DLC]]. It was released on September 26, 2023, the same day that the DLC was released on the Marketplace.
